title: L.A. Staples Center: Superstar Shania Twain rocks in the dark after fire knocks out power
text:
L.A. Staples Center: Superstar Shania Twain rocks in the dark after fire knocks out power   
Aug 21, 2015 eTN   
Shania Twain tweeted: "We had so much fun in LA that we blew the power out! We came back up within minutes and kept rocking. 
The LA Staples Center tweeted: Power outages "Don't Impress Shania Twain Much" and she definitely rocked Downtown LA tonight! 
One of the world’s best-selling female artist in history, Shania Twain, performed tonight at Los Angeles Staples Center - and she did it for some time in the dark. 
An explosion was reported just after 10 p.m. in a building at the corner of Flower Street and West Wilshire Boulevard in Los Angeles. 
Firefighters had the blaze out quickly, but the building at 811 South Flower St. suffered “significant structural damage. 
At least five people were injured. The cause of the blast was still under investigation, but it was believed to involve a building generator. 
The fire knocked out power at the Los Angeles Staples Center where super star Shania Twain was performing.
